text: The Lord is my light and my salvation; whom shall I fear? The Lord is the strength of my life; of whom shall I be afraid?
Trust in the Lord with all your heart, and lean not on your own understanding.
For I know the plans I have for you, declares the Lord, plans to prosper you and not to harm you, plans to give you hope and a future.
But the fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, forbearance, kindness, goodness, faithfulness, gentleness, and self-control.
And we know that in all things God works for the good of those who love him, who have been called according to his purpose.
The name of the Lord is a strong tower; the righteous run to it and are safe.
Cast all your anxiety on him because he cares for you.
Do not be anxious about anything, but in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.
And we know that the Son of God has come and has given us understanding, so that we may know him who is true.
Come to me, all you who are weary and burdened, and I will give you rest.
I sought the Lord, and he answered me; he delivered me from all my fears.
If God is for us, who can be against us?
You are the light of the world. A town built on a hill cannot be hidden.
Be strong and courageous. Do not be afraid; do not be discouraged, for the Lord your God will be with you wherever you go.
For we live by faith, not by sight.
The Lord your God is in your midst, a mighty one who will save; he will rejoice over you with gladness.
Let your light shine before others, that they may see your good deeds and glorify your Father in heaven.
So do not fear, for I am with you; do not be dismayed, for I am your God.
Blessed are the pure in heart, for they will see God.
You will keep in perfect peace those whose minds are steadfast, because they trust in you.
He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.
The Lord is close to the brokenhearted and saves those who are crushed in spirit.
He must become greater; I must become less.
What then shall we say in response to these things? If God is for us, who can be against us?
There is no fear in love. But perfect love drives out fear, because fear has to do with punishment. The one who fears is not made perfect in love.
And my God will meet all your needs according to the riches of his glory in Christ Jesus.
As iron sharpens iron, so one person sharpens another.
No weapon forged against you will prevail, and you will refute every tongue that accuses you.
Be still, and know that I am God.
In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.
You are my hiding place; you will protect me from trouble and surround me with songs of deliverance.
But those who hope in the Lord will renew their strength. They will soar on wings like eagles; they will run and not grow weary; they will walk and not be faint.
This is the day that the Lord has made; let us rejoice and be glad in it.
We love because he first loved us.
Therefore, if anyone is in Christ, the new creation has come: The old has gone, the new is here!
The Lord bless you and keep you; the Lord make his face shine on you and be gracious to you.
But the Lord stood by me and strengthened me.
Let everything that has breath praise the Lord.
And we know that all things work together for good to those who love God, to those who are the called according to his purpose.
You will know the truth, and the truth will set you free.
The Lord is my strength and my song; he has become my salvation.
As for me and my house, we will serve the Lord.
The God of hope fill you with all joy and peace in believing, that ye may abound in hope, through the power of the Holy Ghost.
When you pass through the waters, I will be with you; and when you pass through the rivers, they will not sweep over you.
For God so loved the world that he gave his only begotten Son, that whoever believes in Him should not perish but have everlasting life.
The Lord is my shepherd; I shall not want.
I can do all things through Christ who strengthens me.
The Lord is good, a refuge in times of trouble. He cares for those who trust in him.
For we are Godâ€™s handiwork, created in Christ Jesus to do good works, which God prepared in advance for us to do.
The fear of the Lord is the beginning of knowledge, but fools despise wisdom and instruction.
Let your roots grow down into him, and let your lives be built on him.
My grace is sufficient for you, for my power is made perfect in weakness.
You will seek me and find me when you seek me with all your heart.

But the Lord said to Samuel, 'Do not consider his appearance or his height, for I have rejected him. The Lord does not look at the things people look at. People look at the outward appearance, but the Lord looks at the heart.'
Therefore, since we are surrounded by such a great cloud of witnesses, let us throw off everything that hinders and the sin that so easily entangles.
Do everything in love.
And the peace of God, which transcends all understanding, will guard your hearts and your minds in Christ Jesus.
If anyone is thirsty, let him come to me and drink.
With God all things are possible.
And we know that we have come to know him if we keep his commands.
The Lord your God is with you, the Mighty Warrior who saves.
No one can serve two masters. Either you will hate the one and love the other, or you will be devoted to the one and despise the other.
Rejoice in the Lord always. I will say it again: Rejoice!
Whatever you do, work at it with all your heart, as working for the Lord, not for human masters.
I have been young, and now am old; yet have I not seen the righteous forsaken, nor his seed begging bread.
As far as the east is from the west, so far has he removed our transgressions from us.
So whether you eat or drink or whatever you do, do it all for the glory of God.
He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.
The Lord is my strength and my song; he has become my salvation.
A generous person will prosper; whoever refreshes others will be refreshed.
And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.
The Lord will fight for you; you need only to be still.
As a man thinks in his heart, so is he.
The Spirit of the Lord is upon me, because he has anointed me to proclaim good news to the poor.
He has made everything beautiful in its time.
For where your treasure is, there your heart will be also.
But the fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, patience, kindness, goodness, faithfulness, gentleness, self-control.
You have searched me, Lord, and you know me.
The Lord will renew their strength; they will soar on wings like eagles.
Every good gift and every perfect gift is from above.
Let us hold unswervingly to the hope we profess, for he who promised is faithful.
Do not let your hearts be troubled. You believe in God; believe also in me.
And the Lord said, 'I will cause all my goodness to pass in front of you.'
The Lord bless you and keep you; the Lord make his face shine on you.
The righteous cry out, and the Lord hears them; he delivers them from all their troubles.
He will wipe every tear from their eyes.
Be kind and compassionate to one another, forgiving each other, just as in Christ God forgave you.
You are my rock and my fortress; for your name's sake you lead me and guide me.
God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.
Jesus answered, 'I am the way and the truth and the life. No one comes to the Father except through me.'
Do not conform to the pattern of this world, but be transformed by the renewing of your mind.
For the wages of sin is death, but the gift of God is eternal life in Christ Jesus our Lord.
For I can do everything through Christ, who gives me strength.
In the beginning was the Word, and the Word was with God, and the Word was God.
But seek first his kingdom and his righteousness, and all these things will be given to you as well.
Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit.
And without faith it is impossible to please God, because anyone who comes to him must believe that he exists.
For all have sinned and fall short of the glory of God.
But God demonstrates his own love for us in this: While we were still sinners, Christ died for us.
The LORD is my shepherd, I lack nothing.
For we walk by faith, not by sight.
The steadfast love of the Lord never ceases; his mercies never come to an end.
If you declare with your mouth, 'Jesus is Lord,' and believe in your heart that God raised him from the dead, you will be saved.
For God did not send his Son into the world to condemn the world, but to save the world through him.
For where two or three gather in my name, there am I with them.
The Lord is compassionate and gracious, slow to anger, abounding in love.
Be joyful in hope, patient in affliction, faithful in prayer.
I am the Alpha and the Omega, the First and the Last, the Beginning and the End.
And the peace of God, which transcends all understanding, will guard your hearts and your minds in Christ Jesus.
But those who hope in the Lord will renew their strength. They will soar on wings like eagles.
Trust in the LORD with all your heart and lean not on your own understanding.
Now faith is confidence in what we hope for and assurance about what we do not see.
Blessed are the meek, for they will inherit the earth.
For the Spirit God gave us does not make us timid, but gives us power, love and self-discipline.
Do not worry about tomorrow, for tomorrow will worry about itself. Each day has enough trouble of its own.
Therefore, there is now no condemnation for those who are in Christ Jesus.
Create in me a pure heart, O God, and renew a steadfast spirit within me.
The light shines in the darkness, and the darkness has not overcome it.
For it is by grace you have been saved, through faithâ€”and this is not from yourselves, it is the gift of God.
For to me, to live is Christ and to die is gain.
Do not be overcome by evil, but overcome evil with good.
But he was pierced for our transgressions, he was crushed for our iniquities.
The Lord is good to those whose hope is in him, to the one who seeks him.
I have told you these things, so that in me you may have peace. In this world you will have trouble. But take heart! I have overcome the world.
Be kind and compassionate to one another, forgiving each other, just as in Christ God forgave you.
For the word of God is alive and active. Sharper than any double-edged sword.
Therefore, if anyone is in Christ, the new creation has come: The old has gone, the new is here!
For the Lord is good and his love endures forever; his faithfulness continues through all generations.
Greater love has no one than this: to lay down oneâ€™s life for oneâ€™s friends.
And whatever you do, whether in word or deed, do it all in the name of the Lord Jesus.
Whoever does not love does not know God, because God is love.
For all have sinned and fall short of the glory of God.
Be strong and courageous. Do not be afraid; do not be discouraged, for the Lord your God will be with you wherever you go.
He gives strength to the weary and increases the power of the weak.
Do not be anxious about anything, but in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.
Jesus Christ is the same yesterday and today and forever.
The LORD is close to the brokenhearted and saves those who are crushed in spirit.
Give thanks to the LORD, for he is good; his love endures forever.
For we are Godâ€™s handiwork, created in Christ Jesus to do good works.
Let love and faithfulness never leave you; bind them around your neck.
The Lord is righteous in all his ways and faithful in all he does.
But you, Lord, are a shield around me, my glory, the One who lifts my head high.
Blessed are those who hunger and thirst for righteousness, for they will be filled.
For the eyes of the Lord range throughout the earth to strengthen those whose hearts are fully committed to him.
For you created my inmost being; you knit me together in my motherâ€™s womb.
A new command I give you: Love one another. As I have loved you, so you must love one another.
Be still before the Lord and wait patiently for him.
Blessed are the merciful, for they will be shown mercy.
The heavens declare the glory of God; the skies proclaim the work of his hands.
So in Christ Jesus you are all children of God through faith.
Let your conversation be always full of grace, seasoned with salt, so that you may know how to answer everyone.
Cast your burden on the Lord, and he will sustain you; he will never permit the righteous to be moved.
Come near to God and he will come near to you.
Do not repay anyone evil for evil. Be careful to do what is right in the eyes of everyone.
Therefore, there is now no condemnation for those who are in Christ Jesus.
For I am convinced that neither death nor life, neither angels nor demons, neither the present nor the future, nor any powers will be able to separate us from the love of God.
Therefore, if anyone is in Christ, the new creation has come: The old has gone, the new is here!
The Lord is my strength and my shield; my heart trusts in him, and he helps me.
Blessed are the peacemakers, for they will be called children of God.
And without faith it is impossible to please God, because anyone who comes to him must believe that he exists and that he rewards those who earnestly seek him.
Do not let your hearts be troubled. You believe in God; believe also in me.
The Lord will fight for you; you need only to be still.
God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.
I praise you because I am fearfully and wonderfully made; your works are wonderful, I know that full well.
The Lord is near to all who call on him, to all who call on him in truth.
Above all else, guard your heart, for everything you do flows from it.
I have hidden your word in my heart that I might not sin against you.
Taste and see that the Lord is good; blessed is the one who takes refuge in him.
The earth is the Lord's, and everything in it, the world, and all who live in it.
I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go; I will counsel you with my loving eye on you.
Blessed is the one who does not walk in step with the wicked or stand in the way that sinners take.
Blessed are the pure in heart, for they will see God.
The thief comes only to steal and kill and destroy; I have come that they may have life, and have it to the full.
For the Lord takes delight in his people; he crowns the humble with victory.
May the God of hope fill you with all joy and peace as you trust in him.
Set your minds on things above, not on earthly things.
Love the Lord your God with all your heart and with all your soul and with all your strength.
I love the Lord, for he heard my voice; he heard my cry for mercy.
Let your light shine before others, that they may see your good deeds and glorify your Father in heaven.
The name of the Lord is a fortified tower; the righteous run to it and are safe.
Let everything that has breath praise the Lord. Praise the Lord.
And we know that in all things God works for the good of those who love him, who have been called according to his purpose.
And the God of all grace, who called you to his eternal glory in Christ, after you have suffered a little while, will himself restore you and make you strong, firm and steadfast.
Your word is a lamp for my feet, a light on my path.
For where two or three gather in my name, there am I with them.
I sought the Lord, and he answered me; he delivered me from all my fears.
If we confess our sins, he is faithful and just and will forgive us our sins and purify us from all unrighteousness.
The heavens declare the glory of God; the skies proclaim the work of his hands.
God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.
Come to me, all who labor and are heavy laden, and I will give you rest.
Blessed are those who mourn, for they shall be comforted.
My flesh and my heart may fail, but God is the strength of my heart and my portion forever.
For the word of God is alive and active. Sharper than any double-edged sword.
Even though I walk through the darkest valley, I will fear no evil, for you are with me.
I have fought the good fight, I have finished the race, I have kept the faith.
Let us not grow weary in doing good, for at the proper time we will reap a harvest if we do not give up.
The Lord is my rock, my fortress and my deliverer.
Be completely humble and gentle; be patient, bearing with one another in love.
The Lord is good to those whose hope is in him, to the one who seeks him.
Do not be afraid, little flock, for your Father has been pleased to give you the kingdom.
With man this is impossible, but with God all things are possible.
Let everything that has breath praise the Lord!
The grass withers and the flowers fall, but the word of our God endures forever.
Fear not, for I have redeemed you; I have called you by name, you are mine.
Rejoice always, pray continually, give thanks in all circumstances.
Humble yourselves before the Lord, and he will lift you up.
I lift up my eyes to the mountainsâ€”where does my help come from? My help comes from the Lord.
A friend loves at all times, and a brother is born for adversity.
So if the Son sets you free, you will be free indeed.
Let your gentleness be evident to all. The Lord is near.
Take delight in the Lord, and he will give you the desires of your heart.
Your word is a lamp for my feet, a light on my path.
Therefore encourage one another and build each other up.
For where your treasure is, there your heart will be also.
Above all, love each other deeply, because love covers over a multitude of sins.
I am with you always, to the very end of the age.
You, Lord, are forgiving and good, abounding in love to all who call to you.
I praise you because I am fearfully and wonderfully made.
Those who sow with tears will reap with songs of joy.
For where two or three gather in my name, there am I with them.
I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit.
Whoever follows me will never walk in darkness, but will have the light of life.
Peace I leave with you; my peace I give you.
Seek the Lord while he may be found; call on him while he is near.
Whoever believes in me, as Scripture has said, rivers of living water will flow from within them.
May the Lord bless his people with peace.
As for God, his way is perfect: The Lordâ€™s word is flawless.
I will never leave you nor forsake you.
For the kingdom of God is not a matter of talk but of power.
Be devoted to one another in love. Honor one another above yourselves.
Commit to the Lord whatever you do, and he will establish your plans.
Come to me, all you who are weary and burdened, and I will give you rest.
Whoever does not love does not know God, because God is love.
If we confess our sins, he is faithful and just and will forgive us our sins.
Blessed are the pure in heart, for they will see God.
The Lord gives strength to his people; the Lord blesses his people with peace.
Trust in the Lord forever, for the Lord, the Lord himself, is the Rock eternal.
We love because he first loved us.
The Lord upholds all who fall and lifts up all who are bowed down.
Wait for the Lord; be strong and take heart and wait for the Lord.
For he satisfies the thirsty and fills the hungry with good things.
No eye has seen, no ear has heard, and no mind has imagined what God has prepared for those who love him.
The Lord is a refuge for the oppressed, a stronghold in times of trouble.
The Lord watches over youâ€”the Lord is your shade at your right hand.
Be joyful in hope, patient in affliction, faithful in prayer.
Give thanks to the Lord, for he is good; his love endures forever.
Blessed is the one who trusts in the Lord, whose confidence is in him.
The Lord gives wisdom; from his mouth come knowledge and understanding.
Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you.
For the Lord takes delight in his people; he crowns the humble with victory.
Jesus said, 'I am the bread of life. Whoever comes to me will never go hungry.'
Let us hold fast the confession of our hope without wavering, for he who promised is faithful.
By his wounds you have been healed.
Therefore encourage one another and build each other up.
The Lord is good to all; he has compassion on all he has made.
So do not throw away your confidence; it will be richly rewarded.
A cheerful heart is good medicine, but a crushed spirit dries up the bones.
For the Lord disciplines the one he loves, and chastises every son whom he receives.
The Lord is close to the brokenhearted and saves those who are crushed in spirit.
Your Father knows what you need before you ask him.
Seek peace and pursue it.
Praise the Lord, my soul, and forget not all his benefits.
To the Lord your God belong the heavens, even the highest heavens, the earth and everything in it.
Come, let us bow down in worship, let us kneel before the Lord our Maker.
For the Lord is righteous, he loves justice; the upright will see his face.
In repentance and rest is your salvation, in quietness and trust is your strength.
The Lord will keep you from all harmâ€”he will watch over your life.
The wise in heart accept commands, but a chattering fool comes to ruin.
Teach us to number our days, that we may gain a heart of wisdom.
In the morning, Lord, you hear my voice; in the morning I lay my requests before you.
For I desire mercy, not sacrifice, and acknowledgment of God rather than burnt offerings.
Whoever walks in integrity walks securely, but whoever takes crooked paths will be found out.
Trust in him at all times, you people; pour out your hearts to him, for God is our refuge.
The Lord your God is with you, the Mighty Warrior who saves.
I sought the Lord, and he answered me; he delivered me from all my fears.
Blessed is the one whose transgressions are forgiven, whose sins are covered.
I will never forget your precepts, for by them you have preserved my life.
The fear of the Lord is the beginning of wisdom.
Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.
Be strong and take heart, all you who hope in the Lord.
Behold, I am with you always, to the end of the age.
The Lord will keep you from all harmâ€”he will watch over your coming and going.
O Lord, you are my God; I will exalt you and praise your name.
Be devoted to one another in love. Honor one another above yourselves.
Do not let your hearts be troubled and do not be afraid.
Your kingdom come, your will be done, on earth as it is in heaven.
